original_text: “Beware of the scribes, who like to walk around in long robes, and love greetings in the marketplaces and the best seats in the synagogues and the places of honor at feasts,
korean_text: 긴 옷을 입고 다니는 것을 원하며 시장에서 문안 받는 것과 회당의 높은 자리와 잔치의 윗자리를 좋아하는 서기관들을 삼가라

sentences.original_text: who like to walk around in long robes,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 긴 겉옷을 입고 다니는 것을 좋아하며,

sentences.original_text: and love greetings in the marketplaces
and the best seats in the synagogues
and the places of honor at feasts,
